title: Which is the better guitarist in the band Rammstein, Richard Z. Kruspe or Paul Landers? - Quora

response.answer_text: Paul Landers. Have you heard his Spiel Mit Mir guitar solo? Insane. Actually, they had to answer this question in one interview - who is the better guitarist and who is the handsome one. Kruspe joked: “I´ll take the handsome.” To which Landers laughed. (There is so much sexual tension between them :-) ).

Rammstein is unusual for a metal band, in that their music doesn't rely on guitar-solos. Its like they have a line-up with two rythm-guitarists. However, its Richard Z. Kruspe who plays the few solos they have. Conventional wisdom therefore makes him the better guitarist.
